      • doDelete

        public static boolean doDelete(Idea idea)
                        throws java.lang.Exception
        Cascaded deletion of the given scenes and all its links to the tables
        1. strand
        2. person
        3. location
        Parameters:
        idea - the idea to delete
        Returns:
        true if ch is not null, false otherwise
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
